p: Quantitative analyses were carried out with a 6890N GC-FID system from Agilent Technologies (Santa Clara, CA, USA), equipped with a 7683 autoinjector also from Agilent Technologies (Little Falls, DE, USA). Linear retention indices were calculated through a homologous series of linear alkanes, from n-nonane to n-pentacosane (C 9 purity 99% from BDH, Dubai, UAE; C 10â€“C 25 purity 99% from Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA).
